patient_info: Purpura,Skin rash,Muscle weakness,Ascites,Thrombocytopenia,Anemia,Fever,Leukocytosis,Hepatomegaly,Vertigo,Low back pain,Increased total bilirubin,Recurrent thromboembolism,Respiratory tract infection,Abnormal urinary color,Abnormal erythroid lineage cell morphology,Abnormal granulocytopoietic cell morphology,Hemophagocytosis,Lower limb pain,Gastric varix,Portal vein thrombosis,Productive cough,Hypercoagulability
golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH)
2. Vascular thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP)
3. Severe systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)
4. Hepatic angiosarcoma with disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC)
5. Polyarteritis nodosa (PAN) with liver involvement
6. Microangiopathic hemolytic anemia (MAHA) with renal syndrome
7. Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) with extraintestinal manifestations, such as pyoderma gangrenosum and thrombocytopenia
8. Primary biliary cholangitis (PBC) with portal hypertension and associated complications
9. Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) with bone marrow failure and hypercoagulability
10. Leukemia or myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) with abnormal erythroid and granulocytopoietic cell morphology

Please note that this list is speculative and based on the symptoms provided. Confirmation of any diagnosis would require a thorough clinical evaluation, laboratory testing, and possibly biopsy or other diagnostic procedures.
